entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , McBride
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
